overview: On her way to the Swedish highlands, 19-year old Sarah receives a disturbing text; a compromising sex video of her may be circulating the Internet. While determining the existence of this video, she has to keep it a secret from her parents. Matters take a turn for the worse, when Sarah realizes that their vacation farmhouse has no cell reception. She soon finds herself caught between her parents; they are drifting apart like her own life back home. Secrets cannot be hidden forever and when Sarah's phone finally gains reception, it turns out that the viral video is the least of her problems.
title: Afskåret
